alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Cobb; DeKalb; Douglas; Fayette; North Fulton; Paulding; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:20PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Paulding, southwestern DeKalb, northwestern Fayette, Cobb, southeastern Carroll, Douglas, northern Coweta, Fulton and northwestern Clayton Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 220 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Cross Roads to Sandtown to near Handy, and moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Marietta, Newnan, Douglasville, Decatur, Fayetteville, Dallas, City of South Fulton, Sandy Springs, Smyrna, Peachtree City, East Point, Kennesaw, Acworth, Union City, Forest Park, Riverdale, Villa Rica, College Park, and Powder Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Clayton; Cobb; DeKalb; Douglas; Fayette; North Fulton; Paulding; South Fulton
